title: Personal Research - What was the root cause of the Mars Climate Orbiter (MCO) failure

quizDescription.text:
Purpose of the Activity
The purpose of this activity is to give each student time to learn the facts about the loss of the MCO and what people in positions of authority have to say about what went wrong.

attachment: 09 Personal Research - What was the root cause of the Mars Climate Orbiter failure.pdf

questions.questionText: Summarize the Personal Research - What was the root cause of the Mars Climate Orbiter (MCO) failure
